en.HELP_MESSAGE: Say, help with, then the name of the feature. Features include medicine reminders, healthy habit reminders, health challenges, exercise tracking, or other.
en.HELP_REPROMPT: What can I help you with?
en.FALLBACK_MESSAGE: Sorry, I cannot understand that. Say, vital link help, if you need help with vital link.
